channel.title: Development on EduBlog
channel.description: Recent content in Development on EduBlog

item.title: Fundamental Parts of a Webpage
item.description: The whole purpose of the existence of any webpage should be deliver the information . The type of information decides the genre of the blog post. While the content and information presented on webpage forms the solid foundation of knowledge, presentation is equally important. Basic components of a webpage Descriptive Header Main purpose in body Multimedia formats can help present the information more intuitive way.

item.title: Markdown using Blackfriday Go Parser
item.description: An admonition paragraph draws the reader’s attention to auxiliary information. Its purpose is determined by the label at the beginning of the paragraph. Here are the other built-in admonition types: Asciidoctor supports font-based admonition icons, powered by Font Awesome! Pro tip…​ Don’t forget…​ Watch out for…​ Ensure that…​ https://github.

item.title: What Are Git Tags and Github Releases?
item.description: Git tags on git commit tree illustration Before getting deeper in to git tags, lets first understand the basics information provided by a software package to its users. Components of a release release notes and a packaged software bundle or binaries What are git tags exactly and why need them? Git tags are specific points in the history of your repository, which you might want to rollback in case anything bad happens.
